title: Topic 001 Question 041
body: Your customer support tool logs all email and chat conversations to Cloud Bigtable for retention and analysis. What is the recommended approach for sanitizing this data of personally identifiable information or payment card information before initial storage?
options: Encrypt all data using elliptic curve cryptography
De-identify the data with the Cloud Data Loss Prevention API
Use regular expressions to find and redact phone numbers, email addresses, and credit card numbers
